content: To the Chief Musician. A skillful song,  a didactic  reflective poem.  of David, when Doeg the Edomite came and told Saul, “David has come to the house of Ahimelech.”
The lovingkindness of God  all day long.
Like a sharp razor, working deceitfully.
You love evil more than good,
And falsehood more than speaking what is right.
You love all words that devour,
